name: data-be-analyse-12h-long3
open_rule1: 0.1 < agg.avg_candle < 4 and perc_diff(agg.avg_candle, agg.candle_size) > 300 and res[0].numTrades > 50 and res[0].STX_22[0] == 1 and res[0].close > res[1].close
open_rule2: agg.avg_candle == 0 and agg.candle_size > 1 and res[0].numTrades > 50 and res[0].STX_22[0] == 1 and res[0].close > res[1].close
open_rule3: 0 < agg.avg_candle < 0.1 and perc_diff(agg.avg_candle, agg.candle_size) > 1000 and res[0].numTrades > 50 and res[0].STX_22[0] == 1 and res[0].close > res[1].close
